result.ga: An bhfuil cead agam caitheamh anseo
result.orig: An bhfuil cead agam caitheamh anseo
result.html: An bhfuil cead agam caitheamh anseoMay I smoke here?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil cead agam caiṫeaṁ anseoMay I smoke here?

result.eng: May I go to the toilet?
result.ga: An bhfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leithreas
result.orig: An bhfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leithreas
result.html: An bhfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leithreasMay I go to the toilet?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leiṫreasMay I go to the toilet?

result.eng: You will be allowed to do the exam again.
result.ga: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuair
result.orig: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuair
result.html: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuairYou will be allowed to do the exam again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ cead agat an scrúdú a ḋéanaṁ an aṫuairYou will be allowed to do the exam again.

result.html: Cead isteach saor in aisceEntry free of charge.
result.ponchtml: Cead isteaċ saor in aisceEntry free of charge.

result.eng: A pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.
result.ga: Níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáil
result.orig: Níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáil
result.html: Níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáilA pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.
result.ponchtml: Níl cead pinn luaiḋe a úsáid aċ aṁáin ċun nótaí a ṫógáilA pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.

result.eng: I gave him permission to sit down.
result.ga: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.orig: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.html: Thug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.

result.eng: She was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ga: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.orig: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.html: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ cead aici dul amaċ as an teaċ ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.

result.eng: The day I was set free I felt happy.
result.ga: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroí
result.orig: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroí
result.html: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroíThe day I was set free I felt happy.
result.ponchtml: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo ċroíThe day I was set free I felt happy.
